isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING - HEATER SYSTEM: 2000, 4000, AND 8000 - Before 12/06/1994 - COMPONENTS - HIGH PRESSURE SAFETY SWITCH

svcproc.title: HIGH PRESSURE SAFETY SWITCH
svcproc.para: A high pressure safety switch has been added for HFC-134A air conditioning systems. 2000, 4000 and 8000 Series models have this switch up under the instrument panel near the unit assembly, next to the low pressure switch. The high pressure switch will disengage the A/C clutch when abnormally high pressures (375 psi +/- 20 psi) are reached.
